tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct top(usersession.browserMajorVersion,10),count(*) as "Count" FROM useraction where ${milestoneGoal}

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct top(usersession.browserMajorVersion,10), CONDITION(count(*), WHERE errorCount>0) as "Count" FROM useraction where ${milestoneGoal}

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct DATETIME(starttime,"yyy-MM-dd HH:mm","10m") as "Start Time", ${uspClause.key},CONDITION(avg(visuallyCompleteTime), where ${uspClause.key} IS NOT NULL) as "Visually Complete" FROM useraction where ${uspClause.key} IS NOT NULL

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct DATETIME(starttime,"yyy-MM-dd HH:mm","10m") as "Start Time", ${uspClause.key},CONDITION(count(usersession.totalErrorCount), where ${uspClause.key} IS NOT NULL) as "Count" FROM useraction where ${uspClause.key} IS NOT NULL

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as " " from usersession where ${milestoneGoal}

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as " " from usersession where ${milestoneGoal} and userType="REAL_USER"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as " " from usersession where ${milestoneGoal} and newUser=true

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct useraction.name as "User Action", count(*) as "Requests", CONDITION(count(*), where useraction.isEntryAction=true) as "Entry Count", CONDITION(count(*), where useraction.isExitAction=true) as "Exit Count", CONDITION(COUNT(*), where usersession.bounce=true) as "Bounce Count", avg(duration) as "Duration" FROM useraction where ${milestoneGoal}

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct useraction.matchingConversionGoals as "Conversion Goals",count(*) as "Count" FROM useraction where useraction.matchingConversionGoals IS NOT NULL

threshold.columnId: Error count (by user type, error type, error origin) [web]
